name: **Illaundoon**
description: Illaundoon L783-401 Sheet 44 Small grassy topped islet lying just NW of Illaungorm North. Notable for its views towards the village on Illaungorm North, as well as views N. The narrow cut between it and Illaungorm North allows passage by sea kayak at LW. Landing onto rocky seaweed covered foreshore. Cormorant, Shags, Turnstone and Golden Plover. Camping is possible but hardly in preference to better sites on Illaungorm North
